A4.text: Picasso was born in Málaga, Spain.

A5.text: Picasso lived in Paris, where he met Max Jacob and shared an apartment with him.

A6.text: At the beginning of the century, artists from around the world, including Pablo Picasso, Modigliani, and Henri Matisse made Paris their home.
